row.process:
! --------------------------------------------- :SET &BRIEFNUMMER# = '21' :SET &VERTRAEGE# = 'J' :SET &DEFAULT# = 'J' :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'RZBrief' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '800' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p801_&TS#.out' ! ---------------------------------------------
:INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR
cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# VERTRAEGE = &VERTRAEGE# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# BEARBEITER = &PROGRAMMTYP# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# [BEARBEITER] DEFAULT = &DEFAULT# BRIEFNUMMER = &BRIEFNUMMER# BRIEFE = &BRIEFE_CTV# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
